item.title: Who do you think the best coder is?
item.dc:creator: @Manzarth Manzarth
item.description:
@Manzarth wrote:

Jagex all the way. We wouldnt be on this forum in the first place if it wasnt for them. I think private servers are sad now. If people are such great coders make your own game. Open your own business. And maybe someday sombody will open a forum like this one day about your game. Then you can deal with the hassles of private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Who do you think the best coder is?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Jimma, post:3, topic:324559”]I think it’s funny that you compare Jagex with example Graham because Jagex is a whole team of experienced coders.
To be honest Jagex code everything in a hurry example you gotta laugh at how bad the new “border guards” are made:

292a2jp.jpg1155×374

By the way did you know fishing spots are npcs? That’s because jagex don’t know/want to make objects possible to move. So everything that’s not a player and can move is an npc.[/quote]You’re an idiot. Are you trying to act like you know how Jagex does things?

Read full topic
item.source: Who do you think the best coder is?

item.title: Who do you think the best coder is?
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Jimma, post:3, topic:324559”]I think it’s funny that you compare Jagex with example Graham because Jagex is a whole team of experienced coders.
To be honest Jagex code everything in a hurry example you gotta laugh at how bad the new “border guards” are made:

292a2jp.jpg1155×374

By the way did you know fishing spots are npcs? That’s because jagex don’t know/want to make objects possible to move. So everything that’s not a player and can move is an npc.[/quote]

Why bad?
They’re fun.
Runescape is screwed up anywat, I wan’t it back like 2005.
Jagex is dumb I stopped like for yeasr with the dumb Runescape.

Read full topic
item.source: Who do you think the best coder is?

item.title: Who do you think the best coder is?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:118, topic:324459”][quote author=Jimma link=topic=420872.msg3104379#msg3104379 date=1264015786]
I think it’s funny that you compare Jagex with example Graham because Jagex is a whole team of experienced coders.
To be honest Jagex code everything in a hurry example you gotta laugh at how bad the new “border guards” are made:
http://i45.tinypic.com/292a2jp.jpg
By the way did you know fishing spots are npcs? That’s because jagex don’t know/want to make objects possible to move. So everything that’s not a player and can move is an npc.
[/quote]First of all, that’s not at all how the code potentially looks. Secondly, Jagex can easily make objects move. Third, on monkey madness, the king monkey or whatever is an object IIRC… Yet he moves? And last, I’m not sure whether you’re favoring Jagex, or Graham.[/quote]

Plus the summoning obelisks, for example, pulsate light glow iirc?
Kinda the same thing.

Read full topic
item.source: Who do you think the best coder is?

http://i45.tinypic.com/292a2jp.jpg
By the way did you know fishing spots are npcs? That’s because jagex don’t know/want to make objects possible to move. So everything that’s not a player and can move is an npc.[/quote]First of all, that’s not at all how the code potentially looks. Secondly, Jagex can easily make objects move. Third, on monkey madness, the king monkey or whatever is an object IIRC… Yet he moves? And last, I’m not sure whether you’re favoring Jagex, or Graham.

Read full topic
